title: #43: Co-Host Interview Part 1: Michael Bosstick
itunes:title: #43: Co-Host Interview Part 1: Michael Bosstick
description:
The questions are aimed directly at Michael, as Lauryn hits her co-host extraordinaire with some loaded topics. Michael shares his journey, going from working odd-jobs to turning a little side project called "JetBed," into a flourishing company. Michael also passes on some words of wisdom to young entrepreneurs and shares some tips for couples that work together.
